fields.name: employees
fields.title: Employees
fields.description: People working for this organization. (legacy spelling; see singular form, employee)

fields.name: founders
fields.title: Founders
fields.description: A person who founded this organization (legacy spelling; see singular form, founder).

fields.name: foundingDate
fields.title: Founding Date
fields.description: The date that this organization was founded.

fields.name: legalName
fields.title: Legal Name
fields.description: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.

fields.name: members
fields.title: Members
fields.description: A collection of members of this organization.
